## Barplots 

```{r}

p0 <- all_papers[, by = year, .(counts = title |> unique() |> length())]
p1 <- microbial_papers[, by = year, .(counts = title |> unique() |> length())]

p0$variable <- "All"
p1$variable <- "Microbial"

gr1_df <- rbind(p0, p1)

gr1 <- gr1_df |>
    ggplot(aes(year, counts)) +
    
    # geom_line(aes(color = variable, group = variable)) +
    
    geom_point(aes(fill = variable), color = "grey25",
               shape = 21, size = 5.3, stroke = .25,
               position = position_dodge(width = .9)) +

    geom_col(aes(fill = variable), color = "grey25",
             linewidth = .15,
             position = position_dodge2(width = .9, preserve = "single")) +

    geom_point(aes(color = variable),
               size = 4.65,
               position = position_dodge(width = .9)) +
    
    scale_x_continuous(expand = c(0, 0), breaks = c(2006, 2010, 2015, 2020, 2025)) +
    scale_y_continuous(transform = "log2", expand = c(0, 0), limits = c(NA, 1200), breaks = c(10, 20, 50, 100, 200, 500, 1000)) +
    # scale_y_continuous(expand = c(0, 0), transform = "log2", limits = c(0, 1100), breaks = seq(200, 1000, by = 200)) +
    
    scale_fill_manual(values = c("All" = "#4E79A7" |> lighten(.25), "Microbial" = "#E15759" |> darken(.3))) +
    scale_color_manual(values = c("All" = "#4E79A7" |> lighten(.25), "Microbial" = "#E15759" |> darken(.3))) +
    
    theme_minimal(base_family = "Calibri") +
    
    theme(
        legend.position = "inside",
        legend.position.inside = c(.10, .80),
        legend.title = element_blank(),
        
        axis.line = element_line(lineend = "round"),
        axis.ticks = element_line(lineend = "round"),
        
        panel.grid.major.x = element_blank(),
        panel.grid.minor.x = element_blank(),
        
        panel.grid.minor.y = element_line(linetype = "dotted", lineend = "round"),
        
        axis.title.x = element_text(margin = margin(t = 10)),
        axis.title.y = element_markdown(margin = margin(r = 10))
    ) +
    
    labs(x = "Year", y = "**Number of publications**<br>citing Galaxy papers")
```

## Save plots


```{r}
outfolder <- "../docs/extended/"

dir.create(outfolder, showWarnings = FALSE)

save_plot <- function(plot, filename, w, h) {
    
    ggsave(
        plot = plot, filename = paste0(filename, ".png"),
        width = w, height = h, units = "in", dpi = 600
    )
    
    ggsave(
        plot = plot, filename = paste0(filename, ".svg"),
        width = w, height = h, units = "in", dpi = 600
    )
    
    ggsave(
        plot = plot, filename = paste0(filename, ".pdf"),
        width = w, height = h, units = "in", device = cairo_pdf
    )
    
}

save_plot(gr1, "../docs/extended/figure_1_a", 9, 6)
save_plot(gr2, "../docs/extended/figure_1_b", 9, 6)
```
